definition: mouth like a torrent (idiom)/eloquent/glib/voluble/have the gift of the gab
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to seem/like/as/if
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]

sentences.english: A flow of phrases is no proof of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 口若懸河，無所不能證明真有才智。

sentences.english: He made a speech straight off the reel without stumbling over a word.
sentences.chinese: 他口若懸河，一字不頓地發表了了演講。

sentences.english: Eloquence helps her to handle with the business.
sentences.chinese: 口若懸河對她做生意很有幫助。

sentences.english: He speaks volubly like a flowing river; many people are attracted to stop and listen.
sentences.chinese: 他口若懸河，侃侃而談，吸引了不少人聽。

sentences.english: A fDannynouncedrned of phrases is no proof of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 口若懸河無所不能作爲才智的證明。

sentences.english: Did anybody question any of that clap-trap then?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有人質疑過那些口若懸河的傢伙？

definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
masquerade
to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
pioneer/trailbreaker
to persist in one's views
improvisation
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to show off one's ability
form of words (e.g. inflection, conjugation)/morphology (linguistics)
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
force feeding (as a teaching method)
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
trader or dealer (of stocks and shares etc)
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
lit. deal sincerely and fairly (idiom); frank and open-minded/plain speaking/Let's talk frankly and openly between ourselves./to put one's cards on the table
commendation speech/eulogy/ode
